api/JMRSDKExampleSnippets.FnButtons.html.keywords: Class FnButtons calls function actions when the specific button is pressed; Inheritance Object FnButtons Implements IFn1Handler IFn2Handler Namespace : JMRSDKExampleSnippets Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public class FnButtons : MonoBehaviour, IFn1Handler, IFn2Handler Fields onFn1Action Unity event when Fn1 button is pressed Declaration public UnityEvent onFn1Action Field Value Type Description UnityEvent onFn2Action Unity event when Fn2 button is pressed Declaration public UnityEvent onFn2Action Field Value Type Description UnityEvent Methods OnFn1Action() Called on Fn1 button, when touchpad is pressed once. Declaration public void OnFn1Action() OnFn2Action() Called on Fn2 button, when touchpad is pressed twice. Declaration public void OnFn2Action() Start() Added Global Listener in Start method. Declaration public void Start() Implements IFn1Handler IFn2Handler

Declaration public float throwForce Field Value Type Description Single Methods ThrowBall(GameObject) Instantiate and throw ball prefab from laser pointer origin in the direction of the laser pointer. Declaration public void ThrowBall(GameObject ballToThrow) Parameters Type Name Description GameObject ballToThrow Gameobject Prefab to throw Remarks Needs to be accessed through UnityEvents.
